channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How The 2024 Hurricane Season Shaped Preparedness And Climate Response
item.description: In this series, we explore a year of lessons learned in climate, disasters and sustainability. The 2024 hurricane season, brought superstorms and less...

item.title: 3 AI Tools That Can Help Before Disaster Strikes
item.description: Parts of Northern California experienced two large earthquakes in less than four days. It might be a good time to start considering AI in our disaster...

item.title: You’ve already failed

item.title: Complaints
item.description: The best way to complain is to make things better. Complaining can be a form of intimacy. It’s a useful way to explain our behavior. And best of all, ...

item.title: What if they’re right?

item.title: On the way to professionalism
item.description: Professionals make choices. Including: Don’t exploit friends and family. Surgeons shouldn’t do surgery on their kids, and investment advisors shouldn’...

item.title: ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ Surprise Update 2.2 Has 100 Character Creator Options, 10 New Cars, Live Now
item.description: Well, once again, CDPR has snuck in one more update for Cyberpunk 2077 adding a lot more stuff.

item.title: If TikTok Is Banned, Americans’ Data Could End Up Back In China
item.description: If it takes effect, the TikTok law will ban Oracle from hosting TikTok users’ data. That puts the data back in ByteDance’s hands — where it could flow...

item.title: Will Open AI’s o1 Reasoning Model Really Change The World?
item.description: OpenAI's o1 models, launched in September 2024, introduce a new paradigm in AI reasoning called chain-of-thought reasoning.
